title: LightShow Boilerplate
snippet: LightShow is a 3D graphics/game boilerplate created with the purpose of flexibility, scalability, and simplicity.
features: Text rendering and custom binary file importer and exporter (with byte order swapping for big endian systems)

title: StarDive
snippet: StarDive is a game created with Unity3D and is published on Google Play, Amazon, and the Apple App store. StarDive is my second published project.

title: Aeroflight
snippet: Aeroflight is a game created with Unity3D and is published on Google Play, Amazon, and the Apple App store. Aeroflight is my first published project.

title: Adventures of Lolo!
snippet: Adventures of Lolo! was made in one month for the NES Box art game jam in 2015. It is my third game and my first participation in a game jam. The game is based off of the North American cover Art for the NES title, "Adventures of Lolo".

images.alt: adventures of lolo! small banner image

title: DrumChannel - 2018
snippet: DrumChannel is a website created for the drumming and music community. DrumChannel (in 2018) was built with the collaborated effort of me and the DC team.

title: Old Devrichie
snippet: The old devrichie is what this website used to be. I felt like I wanted to explore some new technology after leaving DrumChannel, so I decided to re-create it.

title: RProj.site
snippet: rproj.site is a showcase of all my work - it contains all of the tools and projects I have used along with information and linkage for each one. Chances are, you're viewing it now.
shortSnippet: A showcase of all my work

title: RichSikra.com
snippet: richsikra is a simple wordpress website.

title: Gentle Grooming Admin Interface
snippet: The appointment scheduling and customer management interface built for Gentle Grooming.

images.title: The form used to add a new customer and their pets to the database.
The customer list- searchable by name or phone number.
